Metadata.title: LameMP3 - Car MP3 Converter & Compatibility Diagnostic Tool
Metadata.description: Optimized for legacy car units and USB players. Fix 'Playback Error', 'Reading Error', and 'Mojibake' issues with one click. Supports FLAC, WAV, APE, M4A to high-compatibility MP3.

Hero.title: Car MP3 Converter & Compatibility Diagnostic Tool
Hero.subtitle: Optimized for legacy car units and USB players. Fix 'Playback Error', 'Reading Error', and 'Mojibake' issues with one click.

dropzone.main: Drop files here or click to upload
dropzone.sub: Supports FLAC, WAV, APE, M4A, AAC to high-compatibility MP3

completed.title: Optimization Complete!
completed.desc: Your file is now 100% compatible with car audio systems

errors.diagnosisFailed: File diagnosis failed, please try again

success.optimizeComplete: Optimization complete! File is ready to download

Diagnosis.title: Why your songs won't play in the car?
Diagnosis.subtitle: Modern audio files (like FLAC or high-res MP3s) often contain complex metadata and variable bitrates that choke legacy car systems. We fix this by standardizing the stream.
Diagnosis.perfectCompatibilityDesc: Your file already has excellent compatibility!

smartDiagnosis.title: AI Smart Diagnosis
smartDiagnosis.desc: Instantly identify compatibility killers like VBR, huge covers, and non-standard headers before you even start converting.

issues.id3v24: ⚠️ ID3v2.4 Tag (Not Supported by Some Legacy Car Units)
issues.flacFormat: ℹ️ Lossless Format, Recommend Converting to MP3
issues.wavFormat: ℹ️ Uncompressed Format, Recommend Converting to MP3

Features.title: Key Features
Features.subtitle: Engineered for audiophiles and legacy hardware alike.

list.title: Smart Scoring System
list.desc: 0-100 checkup based on 7 dimensions (codec, sample rate, bitrate, headers, etc.).

list.title: Extreme Compatibility
list.desc: Forces LAME encoder and CBR mode, adapting to 10-year-old VW, Toyota, Honda and various Android/WinCE units.

list.title: Tag & Cover Cleaner
list.desc: Compresses covers to under 500KB, fixes GBK/UTF-8 encoding issues for proper display.

CarSupport.title: Supports 99% of Car Models & Devices
CarSupport.more: And many more aftermarket head units from Alpine, Clarion, JVC...

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Powered by AI, 7 dimensions. Intelligent scoring and processing

steps.title: 2. Diagnose
steps.desc: Deep scan for file integrity and codec standards.

steps.title: 3. Remaster
steps.desc: Re-encode using LAME 3.100+, standardizing sample rate and channels.

list.q: Why does my car say 'Read Error' or skip songs?
list.a: Likely due to VBR bitrate or large cover art (>1MB). Our tool fixes this.
We use LAME, the best MP3 encoder, with up to 320kbps CBR, ensuring highest quality and compatibility.
Yes, you can upload a whole folder.
While VBR offers better quality and smaller file sizes, many legacy car systems can't parse VBR correctly, causing progress bar issues or playback skips. CBR ensures maximum compatibility.

list.q: Will converted files play on all car systems?
list.a: Our tool generates MP3 files following the strictest standards, compatible with 99% of car audio systems, including most factory and aftermarket units from 2000 onwards.

list.q: Do you store my uploaded files?
list.a: No. All files are processed locally in your browser and not uploaded to any server. Temporary files are automatically deleted after processing, ensuring complete privacy.
